wikitext.*:
'''Salkinórë''' was the name of a continent in the [[Great Lands]], later known as [[wikipedia:Africa|Africa]], according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] associated with ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.<ref>{{PE|12}}, p. xiv</ref>

== Etymology ==
The name ''Salkinórë'' is in [[Qenya]]. It is glossed as "Grass Land" by ''[[Eldamo]]'', consisting of ''[[salki]]'' or ''[[salkë]]'' ("grass") + ''[[nórë]]'' ("land, nation, family, country").<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Paul Strack]]|articleurl=http://eldamo.org/content/words/word-2614954327.html|articlename=ᴱQ. ''Salkinóre'' loc.|website=Eldamo|accessed=23 April 2022}}</ref>

Another name for the place was '''''Andesalkë''''', consisting of ''[[ande(a)]]'' ("long") + ''salkë'', meaning "Long-grass".<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Paul Strack]]|articleurl=http://eldamo.org/content/words/word-4246076815.html|articlename=ᴱQ. ''Andesalke'' loc.|website=Eldamo|accessed=23 April 2022}}</ref> An earlier form of ''Andesalkë'' was ''Andisalkë''.<ref>{{PE|12}}, p. 31</ref>
